info.name: NULIGHT API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for NULIGHT services including Image Relighting, Fashion Editorial, AI Prompt Generation, Object Mask Generation, 3D Model Generation, and Virtual Try-On

item.name: 1. Image Relighting (NULIGHT)

formdata.description: Product image file (OR use image_url instead)
Options: studio, lifestyle, dramatic, minimal, outdoor. Combine with commas.

request.description:
Transform product images with professional lighting variations.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required
- `prompt` (string) - Optional, auto-generated if omitted
- `variation_types` (string) - Optional, default: "studio"
  - Options: `studio`, `lifestyle`, `dramatic`, `minimal`, `outdoor`
  - Combine with commas: `studio,lifestyle,dramatic`

**Response:** Job submission confirmation with `image_id`

item.description: Transform product images with professional lighting variations. Processing time: 30-60 seconds.

item.name: 2. Lookmaker (Fashion Editorial)

request.description:
Create fashion editorial images from outfit photos.

**Parameters:**
- `images` (files) - Required, 1-6 image files

**Response:** Job submission confirmation with `image_id`

item.description: Create fashion editorial images from outfit photos. Processing time: 30-60 seconds.

item.name: 3. AI Prompt Generation

formdata.description: Product image file (OR use image_url instead)

request.description:
Auto-generate optimized product prompts with category detection.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required

**Response:** Job submission confirmation with `image_id`

Check prompt generation status.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status": "completed",
  "prompt": "professional studio photography of luxury watch...",
  "category": "accessories",
  "original_image_url": "https://s3.../product.jpg"
}
```

item.description: Auto-generate optimized product prompts with category detection. Processing time: 10-20 seconds.

item.name: 4. Object Mask Generation (Synchronous)

request.description:
Generate segmentation masks for objects detected in an image (auto-detect all objects).

**⚠️ NOTE:** This is a **synchronous (blocking)** endpoint. The request will block until processing completes (~30-60 seconds). No polling required - result is returned directly.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required

**Response:**
```json
{
  "original_image_url": "https://s3.../image.jpg",
  "object_masks": [
    {
      "object": ["baseball cap"],
      "mask_url": "https://s3.../mask1.png",
      "image_id": 123
    }
  ]
}
```

formdata.description: JSON array of object names to detect

request.description:
Generate masks for specific objects.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required
- `prompt` (JSON array of strings) - Required for specific object detection

**Example prompt value:** `["chair", "table", "lamp"]`

item.name: Generate Object Masks - With Bounding Boxes

formdata.description: JSON object with bounding boxes (skips object detection)

request.description:
Generate masks using pre-computed bounding boxes.

**Parameters:**
- `image_url` (string) - Required
- `bboxes` (JSON object) - Required, skips object detection if provided

**Example bboxes value:** `{"chair": [{"xmin": 100, "ymin": 200, "xmax": 300, "ymax": 400}]}`

item.description: Generate segmentation masks for objects detected in an image. ⚠️ **Synchronous (blocking)** - Processing time: 30-60 seconds.

item.name: 5. 3D Model Generation

formdata.description: Product image file (OR use image_url instead)
REQUIRED (if mask_urls not provided) - Text prompt to specify objects to reconstruct. Examples: 'chair', 'product', 'person', 'baseball cap'

request.description:
Generate 3D models (Gaussian splat + GLB) from product images using SAM 3D.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required
- `prompt` (string) - **REQUIRED** (if mask_urls not provided). Text prompt to specify objects to reconstruct
  - Examples: `'chair'`, `'product'`, `'person'`, `'baseball cap'`

**Note:** You must provide at least one selection method (`prompt` or `mask_urls`)

**Response:** Job submission confirmation with `image_id`

item.name: Submit 3D Generation Job - With Mask URLs

formdata.description: Product image file (OR use image_url instead)
REQUIRED (if prompt not provided) - JSON array of pre-computed mask URLs

request.description:
Generate 3D models using pre-computed mask URLs.

**Parameters:**
- `image` (file) OR `image_url` (string) - Required
- `mask_urls` (JSON array) - **REQUIRED** (if prompt not provided). Pre-computed mask URLs
  - Example: `'["https://s3.../mask1.png"]'`

**Note:** You must provide at least one selection method (`prompt` or `mask_urls`)

Poll to check 3D generation job completion.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status": "completed",
  "gaussian_splat_url": "https://s3.../model.ply",
  "model_glb_url": "https://s3.../model.glb",
  "metadata": [{
    "rotation": [0, 0, 0],
    "translation": [0, 0, 0],
    "scale": [1, 1, 1]
  }],
  "original_url": "https://s3.../original.jpg"
}
```

**Output Formats:**
- **Gaussian Splat (.ply)**: Optimized for web-based 3D viewers
- **GLB Model (.glb)**: Standard 3D format for AR/VR applications
- **Metadata**: Per-object rotation, translation, and scale values

item.description: Generate 3D models (Gaussian splat + GLB) from product images using SAM 3D. Processing time: 60-120 seconds.

item.name: 6. Virtual Try-On

request.description:
Apply garments to person images.

**Parameters:**
- `person_image` (file) - Required
- `garment_image` (file) - Required

**Response:** Job submission confirmation with `image_id`

item.description: Apply garments to person images. Processing time: 30-60 seconds.
